name: Evenings In The Forest
description:
Evenings In The Forest.

  • Your campfire is extinguished
  • You hear noises
  • The noises lie between you and the safety of your car!

Made for Train Jam 2019!

Coding/Design --  Phil Fortier @icefallgames
Art --  Arlen Pringle @arlenpringle
Music -- Maize Wallin @MaizeWallin
